page.title: 17WORK OF A HOUSEWIFE IN 1985
page.content: My Mum spends about half the day doing housework while in her spare time she does dressmaking and knitting. The appliances that she finds most useful are the automatic washing machine, vacuum cleaner, food mixer, cooker, iron and sewing machine. The most useful of these she thinks is the washing machine because she just puts the clothes in, sets the programme, then takes the clothes out when it has finished. The jobs which she does most are cooking, cleaning and washing up but she says that all of these are much easier nowadays because the new appliances are quicker and easier to use than the old ones used to be. I usually go shopping with Mum at weekends and we spend between 1 and 3 hours doing this. She says it is hard work being a housewife because the jobs never come to an end!
